title: Create explicit Spanish (es) UI translation pack

requirements.summary: Replace the current Spanish (es) fallback that references `commonTranslations` with a complete explicit Spanish dictionary covering every key in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons, without changing other languages.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` contains an `es` entry with Spanish translations (not a reference to `commonTranslations`).
All keys defined in `commonTranslations` have corresponding Spanish values in the `es` translation entry (no missing keys).
When selecting “Español” from the in-app language selector, key UI labels (e.g., Home, Welcome, Back, Loading, Game Zone, Quiz Zone, Coloring Section) display in Spanish instead of English.

file_operations.description: Replace `es: commonTranslations` with an explicit `es: { ... }` dictionary containing Spanish values for every key currently in `commonTranslations` (ensure no missing keys, keep any existing emojis/icons in the values, and do not modify any non-`es` language entries).
